Package org.edu_nation.easy_ftc.sensor

Class Color.Builder

java.lang.Object
org.edu_nation.easy_ftc.sensor.Sensor.Builder<Color.Builder>
org.edu_nation.easy_ftc.sensor.Color.Builder
Enclosing class:
Color
public static class Color.Builder extends org.edu_nation.easy_ftc.sensor.Sensor.Builder<Color.Builder>
Construct a Color sensor object using the builder design pattern

Basic Usage: 


 Color color = new Color.Builder(hardwareMap).build();
Defaults:
  • reverse = false
  • name = "color"
  • threshold = 85.0
  • rgbOffsets = {10, -25, 0}
